page.title: 14 St James the Apostle Church
page.content: cont'd Inside, the pews and choir stalls are made of wood and are well polished. Two pews have a cross on them.These are six rounded arches inside the church, three on each side. At the back of the church there is the belfry with five bells. A peal of bells was rung in July 1981 to celebrate the wedding of Prince Charles and Lady Diana. Above the altar are four stained glass windows of St. Peter, St. Paul, St. James and St. John. The lectern held a very old bible with the letter 'f' instead of our 's'. Jesus was written Jefuf.
